items.value: I can learn you how to craft a Donut Hoven!

Are you ready for our donut project?
I want to start as soon as possible!

However, we need the following:
2x Plastic Scrap
2x Metal Scrap

Get sure you have 3 free Slots for your Gifts!
As soon as you have these things in your inventory come back to me...
where can i find these materials?
Sure Bro, i have the Items with me...
i am busy, i will come back later!

It's best to search the bins.
However, you can also buy this things.
I don't know where to buy them!
Ok, i think i have the Items with me

Excellent!

Now I can finally build my printer to print a book for the donut Hoven.
By the way you also got a Hoven and a Donut!

So now I have to continue ...
visit me if you want another task!

You got: 1x Donut, 1x Donut Hoven Book, 1x Donut Hoven
Yeh Bro! Will do and thanks for the Book!

You dont have the Materials with you!
please come back as soon you got them...
